title: Pickled carrots and onions

ingredients.details: small or baby, quartered and separated into petals

instructions: Boil the mustard seeds in a pan of water for about 1 hour until softened; drain. Meanwhile, in a small pan, warm the vinegar, sugar and salt with 200ml water until the sugar's dissolved; set aside to cool.
Remove the tops from the carrots and slice into long ribbons with a vegetable peeler, then put in a small, deep tray with the onions, dill, and mustard seeds.
Pour the cooled pickling liquor over the top to cover. Cover with clingfilm and chill for at least 4 hours, preferably overnight.
